name: Whiskered Away - Alpha Build
description:
This is the free public alpha which I'm releasing in order to create a community around the game. Over time this beta will be updated to reflect current progress on the full game which will be released on completion right here from Itch.io and on Steam,

The alpha build demonstrates proper gameplay currently present in this early version and it should provide a solid impression of what to expect of the game's the final release.

Get Involved
If you would like to get involved and support the development of this game or any future projects feel free to take a look at my Patreon page. I currently have a small number of interesting prototypes (this one included) on offer if you are interested in supporting me as a developer.

Of course you can always just join my Discord server and get involved there to share ideas, feedback and what not!

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/Joure

Discord:
https://discord.gg/XVgHZdx8fp
